FinanceQuote.Quote: Money is a terrbile master but an excellent servant.
FinanceQuote.Author: P.T Barnum

FinanceQuote.Quote: Beware of little expenses; a small leak will sink a great ship.
FinanceQuote.Author: Benjamin Franklin

FinanceQuote.Quote: The desire of gold is not for gold. It is for the means of freedom and benefit.
FinanceQuote.Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

FinanceQuote.Quote: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
FinanceQuote.Author: Benjamin Franklin

FinanceQuote.Quote: I will tell you the secret to getting rich on Wall Street. You try to be greedy when others are fearful. And you try to be fearful when others are greedy.
FinanceQuote.Author: Warren Buffett

FinanceQuote.Quote: Formal education will make you a living; self-education will make you a fortune.
FinanceQuote.Author: Jim Rohn

FinanceQuote.Quote: Money is only a tool. It will take you wherever you wish, but it will not replace you as the driver.
FinanceQuote.Author: Ayn Rand

FinanceQuote.Quote: Buy when everyone else is selling and hold until everyone else is buying. That’s not just a catchy slogan. It’s the very essence of successful investing.
FinanceQuote.Author: J. Paul Getty

FinanceQuote.Quote: How many millionaires do you know who have become wealthy by investing in savings accounts? I rest my case.
FinanceQuote.Author: Robert G. Allen

FinanceQuote.Quote: Wealth is the ability to fully experience life.
FinanceQuote.Author: Henry David Thoreau

FinanceQuote.Quote: You must gain control over your money or the lack of it will forever control you.
FinanceQuote.Author: Dave Ramsey

FinanceQuote.Quote: It's not how much money you make, but how much money you keep, how hard it works for you, and how many generations you keep it for.
FinanceQuote.Author: Robert Kiyosaki

FinanceQuote.Quote: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
FinanceQuote.Author: Bruce Lee

FinanceQuote.Quote: A journey of a thousand miles must begin with a single step.
FinanceQuote.Author: Lao Tzu

FinanceQuote.Quote: The best thing money can buy is financial freedom.
FinanceQuote.Author: Me

FinanceQuote.Quote: If we command our wealth, we shall be rich and free. If our wealth commands us, we are poor indeed.
FinanceQuote.Author: Edmund Burke
